overview: Internationally-renowned artist Fiore De Henriquez sculpted the Queen Mother, Peter Ustinov, Igor Stravinsky, Oprah Winfrey, Prime Minister Yoshida and John F. Kennedy among many others. But there was more to Fiore than sculpture, drawing and architecture. While battling with—and eventually accepting—her intersexuality, duality became a prominent theme in her art, her life and her explosive love affairs.
title: Fiore - In Love With Clay
